name: Kathryn Herod
summary: Full-stack software engineer with 7+ years of experience building scalable applications using C# and modern frontend frameworks. Proven track record of modernizing legacy systems, implementing test-driven development practices, and leading cross-functional teams. Strong background in technical execution and business strategy.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
achievements: Architected scalable back-end services using C# and ASP.NET, improving system performance
Built responsive frontend applications with TypeScript, React, and Angular
Drove technical decisions throughout the full software development lifecycle

experience.title: Front End Developer
achievements: Spearheaded frontend modernization initiatives, increasing team delivery velocity
Established test-driven development standards, reducing production bugs
Integrated multiple backend APIs to expand application functionality

experience.title: Front End Developer
achievements: Designed comprehensive design system for retail point-of-sale applications
Developed reusable JavaFX components, accelerating development cycles

experience.title: Front End Developer & Scrum Master
achievements: Led frontend development while serving as Scrum Master for cross-functional teams
Implemented Scrum methodologies that improved project delivery timelines
Mentored developers on best practices and facilitated sprint planning

experience.title: Software Engineer Senior Analyst
achievements: Developed responsive single-page applications using Angular and React
Created interactive mockups for enterprise software redesigns
Facilitated design thinking workshops with stakeholders

experience.title: Entrepreneur & Pastry Chef
achievements: Founded and scaled cooking education business to $600,000 annual revenue before acquisition
Managed full-stack web development and secure e-commerce integration
Led teams of up to 40 people during high-volume events
